alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 7:42AM CST until January 25 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following counties, Grimes, Montgomery, Polk, San Jacinto, Trinity and Walker. * WHEN...Until 145 PM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 741 AM CST, Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area due to previous local rainfall and upstream runoff. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Huntsville, Trinity, Onalaska, New Waverly, Coldspring, Point Blank, Riverside, Huntsville State Park, Sebastopol, Lake Livingston State Park, West Livingston, Oakhurst, Crabbs Prairie, Evergreen and Dacus. - This includes the following Low Water Crossings... Mary Wagner Road at Hostetter Creek, Dacus Johnson Road at Lake Creek, Farm to Market 149 at Little Lake Creek, Forest Woods Lane at Little Lake Creek Tributary, Magnum Road at West Tempe Creek , Interstate 45 East Frontage Road at Nelson Creek, River Oaks Drive at Prairie Branch, State Highway 75 at Town Branch, Sunset Lake Road at McDonald Creek and State Highway 75 at Town Branch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
